message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Let me know if you're interested in negotiating further.
I understand you're on a budget, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. How about $12,000? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident I can make good use of the product.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I think you're undervaluing the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $16,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle at $13,500?

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. This represents a significant compromise on my part and is a fair price for both of us.  Let me know if this is something you can work with.
